title: Artificial Intelligence
subtitle: Explore the foundations of intelligent systems and algorithms

topics.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
topics.description: Definition and scope of AI, historical evolution, key milestones, different types of AI (Narrow, General, Super), and diverse applications across industries. Comparison between AI and human intelligence.

topics.title: Intelligent Agents
topics.description: Concept of agents and environments (PEAS description). Understanding rationality, autonomy, and types of agent architectures: simple reflex, model-based reflex, goal-based, utility-based, and learning agents.

topics.title: Problem Solving & Search Strategies
topics.description: Formulating problems for AI. Uninformed search algorithms (BFS, DFS, UCS, DLS, IDS). Informed (Heuristic) search algorithms (Greedy Best-First, A* Search). Local search (Hill Climbing, Simulated Annealing) and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (CSP).

topics.title: Game Playing and Adversarial Search
topics.description: Introduction to game theory in AI. Minimax algorithm for optimal decision-making in two-player games. Alpha-Beta Pruning for optimizing Minimax. Game trees and strategic considerations.

topics.title: Knowledge Representation & Reasoning
topics.description: Using propositional and first-order logic for knowledge representation. Inference techniques (Forward/Backward Chaining). Rule-based systems, semantic networks, frames, and ontologies. Reasoning under uncertainty (Bayesian networks, fuzzy logic).

topics.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
topics.description: Overview of Machine Learning. Types: Supervised, Unsupervised, Reinforcement Learning. The ML workflow, model evaluation metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score), concepts of overfitting, underfitting, and bias-variance tradeoff. Feature engineering and data preprocessing techniques.

topics.title: Supervised Learning Algorithms
topics.description: Regression models (Linear, Logistic). Classification algorithms (Decision Trees, K-Nearest Neighbors, Support Vector Machines, Naive Bayes). Ensemble methods (Random Forest, Bagging, Boosting like AdaBoost, Gradient Boosting). Cross-validation and hyperparameter tuning.

topics.title: Unsupervised Learning Algorithms
topics.description: Clustering techniques (K-Means, Hierarchical Clustering, DBSCAN). Dimensionality reduction methods (Principal Component Analysis - PCA, t-SNE). Association rule mining (Apriori algorithm, FP-Growth).

topics.title: Reinforcement Learning
topics.description: Core concepts of Reinforcement Learning. Markov Decision Processes (MDPs). Value iteration and Policy iteration. Q-learning and SARSA algorithms. Introduction to Deep Q-Networks (DQN).

topics.title: Neural Networks & Deep Learning
topics.description: From biological to artificial neurons. Perceptrons and Multi-Layer Perceptrons (MLPs). Backpropagation algorithm. Activation functions. Architectures: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs), LSTMs, GANs. Transfer learning and pre-trained models.

topics.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
topics.description: Text preprocessing (tokenization, stemming, lemmatization). Language models (N-grams, Word Embeddings like Word2Vec, GloVe, BERT). Named Entity Recognition (NER), Part-of-Speech (POS) tagging, sentiment analysis. Transformers and attention mechanisms. Chatbots and text generation.

topics.title: Computer Vision
topics.description: Fundamentals of image processing. Feature extraction techniques (SIFT, SURF, HOG). Image classification, object detection (e.g., YOLO, SSD), and image segmentation. Applications like face recognition and optical character recognition (OCR).

topics.title: Advanced AI Topics & Ethics
topics.description: Explainable AI (XAI) for model transparency. Ethical considerations in AI: bias, fairness, accountability, and privacy. AI in autonomous systems (e.g., self-driving cars), robotics. Applications in healthcare, finance, and education.

topics.title: AI Tools & Frameworks
topics.description: Programming with Python for AI. Essential libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, OpenCV. Deep Learning frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras. Model deployment tools (Flask, Streamlit, Docker). Version control (Git) and experiment tracking (MLflow).

topics.title: Future of AI & Emerging Trends
topics.description: The quest for Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). AI and consciousness. AI in Industry 4.0. Emerging technologies like Edge AI, Federated Learning, and Quantum Machine Learning. Research frontiers, career paths, and future opportunities in AI.
